CustomField.description: If the contact is eligible to receive SMS messages
CustomField.formula:
OR( Account.RecordType.Name = "Contractor",
AND( Account.Has_Accepted_Contractor_Agreement__c = True, OR( MobilePhone = Account.Primary_Phone_From_Agreement__c, MobilePhone = Account.Secondary_Phone_From_Agreement__c)) )
CustomField.label: SMS Eligible
